alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Itawamba; Lafayette; Lee; Pontotoc; Prentiss; Tallahatchie; Tishomingo; Union; Yalobusha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 15 at 2:26PM CST until January 17 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 14 below zero. For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Portions of North Mississippi. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 10 AM CST Wednesday. For the Winter Storm Warning, until midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Itawamba; Lafayette; Lee; Pontotoc; Prentiss; Tallahatchie; Tishomingo; Union; Yalobusha
